job.title: Java Software Engineer-Web Services-Jr Level
job.description: Purpose of JobbrbrWe are currently seeking talented Java Software Engineers Jr Level for our Phoenix AZ location for teams inside our Chief Administrative Office groupbrbrUSAA Java Software Engineers create and maintain APIs for our business software applications that our members use Done well many may never realize or appreciate how critical these APIs are or how weve made them simpler Faster Safer Yet they help make our members lives better Its a great challenge and responsibilitybrbrHere you will invent Youll design and test Youll take risks Youll create new technology but the impact youll make on our members will be far more significantbrbrJob RequirementsbrbrAs a Java Engineer you are expected to be able to function in a fastpaced environment driving innovation through rapid prototyping and iterative development ensuring quality is built into all solutions leveraging TDD Your responsibilities will require you to be knowledgeable in API development You will be a part of teams of developers guiding on engineering and architecture best practices as well as demonstrate the ability to partner and engage with other engineers and architects You will work closely with business clients and UI designers to analyze user requirements code applications and customize andor integrate commercial software packages for both internal employees and external memberfacing applications across multiple platformsbrbrAs a Java Engineer it will be your responsibility to maintain code integrity and qualitybrbrstronguAbout USAAbrbrustrongUSAA knows what it means to serve We facilitate the financial security of millions of US military members and their families This singular mission requires a dedication to innovative thinking at every levelbrbrUSAA Careers  World Class Benefits 31 secondsbrbrstronguPrimary ResponsibilitiesbrustrongulliWith limited guidance performs defect correction analysis design code on less complex issues andor codes applications of medium complexityliliWith guidance begins to install customize and integrate commercial software packagesliliWorks with more tenured peers to gain understanding of systems while conducting root cause analysis of issues reviewing new and existing code andor performing unit testingliliWorks with experienced team members to conduct root cause analysis of issues review new and existing code andor perform unit testingliliLearns to create system documentationplay books and attends requirements design and code reviewsliliReceives work packages from manager andor delegatesliliUnderstands and assists in gathering and analyzing customer requirements and may respond to outages following the appropriate processesliliPartners with experienced team members to develop accurate estimates on work packages May begin to identify issues that impact availabilitybrliulstronguMinimum RequirementsbrustrongulliBachelors degree in related field of study OR Certification from an approved technical field of study OR 4 additional years of IT experience beyond the minimum required in lieu of a degree liliAND 2 years of software engineeringdevelopment experience utilizing Java with experience working with RESTful Web ServicebrliulstronguPreferred Experiencebrustrongulli2 years in REST frameworks with focus on API developmentlili1 years in AGILE methodologylili1 years experience working with JavaScriptlili1 years experience integrating with backend services like JMS J2C ORM frameworks Hibernate JPA JDO etc JDBCliliAbility to implement container based APIs using a container frameworks OpenShift Docker or KubernetesliliRelational Database design and optimization with Oracle DB2 MySQL PostgressliliFamiliar with Gradle GIT GitHUB GITLab etc around continuous integration and continuous delivery infrastructureliliExperience testing in REST servicesliliExperience in design and develop automated test frameworkbrliulThe above description reflects the details considered necessary to describe the principal functions of the job and should not be construed as a detailed description of all the work requirements that may be performed in the jobbrbrstrongCompensation strongUSAA has an effective process for assessing market data and establishing ranges to ensure we remain competitive You are paid within the salary range based on your experience and market position The salary range for this position is 6630000  11950000  this does not include geographic differential it may be applied based on your work locationbrbrEmployees may be eligible for pay incentives based on overall corporate and individual performance or at the discretion of the USAA Board of DirectorsbrulliGeographical Differential Geographic pay differential is additional pay provided to eligible employees working in locations where market pay levels are above the national averagebrliulstrongShift premiumstrong will be addressed on an individualbasis for applicable roles that are consistently scheduled for noncore hoursbrbrstrongBenefits strongAt USAA our employees enjoy bestinclass benefits to support their physical financial and emotional wellness These benefits include comprehensive medical dental and vision plans 401k pension life insurance parental benefits adoption assistance paid time off program with paid holidays plus 16 paid volunteer hours and various wellness programs Additionally our career path planning and continuing education assists employees with their professional goalsbrbrPlease click on the link below for more detailsbrbrstrongUSAA Total
